headline: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (NYSE:ZBH) Proposes Officer Exculpation Amendment at Upcoming Shareholder Meeting
summary: Zimmer Biomet Holdings (NYSE:ZBH) recently announced proposed changes to its corporate governance structure, aiming to amend its Restated Certificate of Incorporation. This amendment, which will be discussed at the annual shareholders' meeting, potentially added to the 2% price decline over the last quarter, amidst a broader market uptick of 5.8% in recent days. Other than corporate governance, factors like a decrease in net income in the latest earnings report, down from the previous year,...
